name: divinylbenzene
Restrictions: SML expressed as the sum of divinylbenzene and ethylvinylbenzene.It may contain up to 45 % (m/m) of ethylvinylbenzene
NotesCompliance: V1 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA) pending the availability of an analytical method.
Notes: ND The specific migration limit is non-detectable (ND). A detection limit of 0.01mg substance per kg food is applicable unless specified differently for an individual substance.
ExpressedAs: As the sum of divinylbenzene and ethylvinylbenzene
